verses.1: Hih lai-a kigelh thupiangte pen India gam panin Ethiopia gam dong, gamneu za khat sawm nih le sagih a uk Ahasuerasʼ hun lai-a piang thu ahi hi.
verses.2: Hih hun laitakin kumpi khua ahi Susa khuapi sunga kumpi tokhom tungah amah tu hi.
verses.3: Ama uk a kum thumna kumin ama nuai-a a uliante khempeuh le a nasemte adingin pawi khat bawlsak hi. Ama khutnuai-a om Persia le Media galkap maangte le ama nuai-a uliante le ama nuai ah gam a uksawnte a om laitakin,
verses.4: a kumpi gam hauhna le ama thupi ziazuana ni tampi sung, ni za le ni sawm giat sung tak a lak hi.
verses.5: Hih pawi hun a bei khit ciangin kumpi khua Susa khuapi sunga om mi lian mi neu mi khempeuh adingin kumpipa in pawi khat a bawl hi. Tua pawi pen kumpi inn huang sungah kibawl a, ni sagih sung kibawl hi.
verses.6: Tua huang sungah suangkang khuamte kiphut a, khau malneu le khau dupsan tawh ngun kualte ah kikhihin a kikhai dalna puan pakte kikhungin, suangmanpha a san, a dum, a kang le a vom, a nam tuamtuamte kizangin a kizem suangphah kiphah tungah kham le ngun kibawl lupnate kikoih hi.
verses.7: Kham hai nam tuamtuamte tawh zu kihawm a, kumpipaʼ hauhna tawh kituakin deihdeihin zu kizang hi.
verses.8: Tua lai ah zunekna zia pen kihah piak cih om lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh mi khempeuh in amauʼ duh zahzah bek a neksakna ding uh kumpipa in a nuai-a a uliante thu pia hi.
verses.9: Tua banah Kumpinu Vashti in zong numeite adingin Kumpipa Ahasuerasʼ inn sung mahah pawi khat a bawl hi.
verses.10: A ni sagih ni, zunekna hangin a lung a nop ciangin kumpipa in ama na a sem innsung maang sagihte Mehuman, Biztha, Harbona, Bigtha, Abagtha, Zethar le Karkas-te sam a, mite le uliante mai ah Kumpinu Vashti a melhoihna a lah theih nadingin a kumpi lukhu khusa-in ama kiangah a paipih nadingun a sawl hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua nu a mel a hoih takpi mah ahi hi.
verses.12: Ahih hangin Kumpinu Vashti in innsung maangteʼ thupuak kumpipaʼ sapna a nial hi. Hih a nialna thu ah kumpipa heh mahmah a, a hehna hangin a sin so hi.
verses.13: Tua ciangin kumpipa in upadi siam a mipilte thu dong hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh upadi le biakna lam thu theite khempeuh thu dot pen kumpipaʼ zat ngei khat ahi hi.
verses.14: Ama gei nai pen ah a tu mite pen Persia le Media gam ulian sagihte ahi Karshena, Shethar, Admatha, Tarshish, Meres, Marsena le Memukan-te hi uh a, kumpipa kiangah a hawh thei, kumpi gam sungah ulian pente ahi uh hi.
verses.15: “Inn sung mangteʼ tungtawnin keimah kumpi Ahasuerasʼ thupiakna bangin Kumpinu Vashti gamta lo ahih manin Kumpinu Vashti tungah upadi tawh kizui-in bangci kihih ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
verses.16: Tua ciangin kumpipa le ulianteʼ zakin Memukan in dawng a, “Kumpinu Vashti khial hi; kumpipa tung bek hi loin Kumpipa Ahasuerasʼ ukna gam sung khempeuh a om uliante le mi khempeuh tungah zong a khial ahi hi.
verses.17: Kumpinuʼ gamtatna thu numei dangte khempeuh in thei ding uh a, hih thu hangin numeite in a pasalte uh simmawh ding uh a, amaute in, ‘Kumpipa Ahasueras in ama kiangah a pai dingin Kumpinu Vashti thu pia napi-in pai lo hi,’ ci ding uh hi.
verses.18: Hih banga kumpinuʼ gamtatna thu a za Persia le Media gam numei liante in kumpipa nuai-a uliante tungah tu ni mahmah in hih thu gen ding uh a, kisimmawhna le kizahtak lohna tampi piangsak ding hi.
verses.19: Kumpipa in hoih na sak leh, kumpi thupiakna khat paisak inla, Kumpipa Ahasuerasʼ mai ah Vashti a kilakkik nawn loh nadingin a kikhelkik ngei nawn lo ding Persia mite le Media miteʼ upadi sungah gelhsak in. Tua ciangin amah sangin a kilawm zaw numei khat ama za luahsak in.
verses.20: Tua banga kumpipaʼ thupiakna thu kumpi gam sung khempeuh ah a kizak ciangin numei khempeuh in a neu a lian amauʼ pasal ciat zahtak ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
verses.21: Kumpipa le uliante in hih ngaihsutna hoih sa uh a, Memukanʼ gen bangin kumpipa a gamta hi.
verses.22: Pasal khempeuh pen ama inn sung ukpa ahih nading le ama kampau a kizuih kim nadingin kumpipaʼ ukna gam khempeuh ah amauʼ lai ciat le mi khempeuh tungah amauʼ pau ciatin laikhakte kigelh hi.
